Description: Rim sherd of Attic red-figured pottery lid; interior glazed black; exterior: on top, dotted ovolo frieze with reserved line near edge; on overhanging rim, reserved ivy leaves and incised tendrils; cluster of six added white berries with possible added yellow.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.0837) (Phase 1)
